title: Dhaka University
text: Education gives us an understanding of the world around us and offers us an opportunity to use that knowledge wisely.

title: Universal College Islamabad
text: In that respect, here are some powerful education quotes to help us appreciate the power of learning and gaining knowledge.

title: University of Valencia
text: Education is one of the most powerful things in life. It allows us to find the meaning behind everything and helps improve lives in a massive way.

title: PSL Research University
text: Upon the subject of education â€¦ I can only say that I view it as the most important subject which we as a people may be engaged in

title: University of Delhi
text: It is as impossible to withhold education from the receptive mind as it is impossible to force it upon the unreasoning.

title: Heidelberg University
text: Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.

title: University of Toronto
text: Education is for improving the lives of others and for leaving your community and world better than you found it.

title: Adelphi University
text: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth
